Text: If this Ebook will be of use to you, Please give me some Luv :-)
I stopped smoking 13 years ago with the help of this book.
@euraff, That's terrific! My father stopped smoking at the age of 74 with the help of this book. It's never too late to quit.
@ZDaddy. I borrowed the book from my neighbours who also stopped - they haven`t smoked since!!

I would love to give it up - Thanks in advance!!- Heres hoping.

Thank You!
@cranswick: You CAN do it! Just keep remembering why you want to quit! The help is out there. Believe in yourself.
